name: spotPriceAPI
description: Get real-time token price data from 1inch Spot Price API. This function provides current token prices across various blockchains. ALWAYS provide both 'endpoint' and 'chain' parameters - they are mandatory.

endpoint.description: REQUIRED: The spot price API endpoint to call

examples.description: Get prices for all whitelisted tokens on the chain
Get prices for specific tokens (requires tokens array)
Get prices for multiple token addresses (requires addresses array)

chain.description: REQUIRED: Chain ID for the blockchain network

tokens.description: Array of token addresses (required for getRequestedPrices endpoint)

addresses.description: Array of token addresses (required for getPricesForAddresses endpoint)

currency.description: Optional currency code (e.g., 'USD'). If not provided, prices returned in native Wei
